meta.project: Malayalees US Site Event Management Platform

product_overview: A comprehensive event management platform tailored for the Malayalees US community, providing seamless event creation, registration, payments, and administration through a secure and user-friendly interface.
core_goals: Enable event organizers to create, manage, and publish events with ease.
Provide users with a smooth registration and ticketing experience, including payments.
Support multi-tenant architecture to isolate data per organization or tenant.
Offer robust admin dashboards for event analytics, reporting, and user management.
Integrate secure authentication using social login and profile management.
Ensure reliable payment processing via Stripe for tickets and subscriptions.
Facilitate efficient attendee check-in via QR code generation and scanning.
Deliver advanced search and filtering capabilities for events and registrants.
Support email notifications and communication related to events.
Maintain a clean, accessible, and responsive UI using modern frameworks and components.
key_features: Event Management System with full lifecycle support including event creation, settings, registrations, and detailed reports.
User Authentication and Profile Management through Clerk with social login integration.
Admin Dashboard featuring navigation, usage tracking, and event analytics.
Stripe Payments integration for handling event tickets and subscription fees securely.
Event Registration Forms with guest management and QR code ticket delivery.
Multi-tenant Architecture ensuring data isolation per tenant and scalability.
Real-time Event Analytics and Reporting dashboards to monitor registrations and attendance.
Advanced Search and Filtering for easy navigation through events and registration lists.
QR Code based Check-in System for onsite attendee verification.
Email and Notification System for automated communications related to events.
Reusable UI components styled with Tailwind CSS and Radix UI for consistency and accessibility.
Media Management tools for file uploads and event related content organization.
user_flow_summary: Users authenticate via social login, create profiles, and browse events available within their tenant.
Event organizers access the admin dashboard to create and configure new events, manage settings and media.
Users register for events via user-friendly forms, choose ticket options and complete payments through Stripe integration.
Upon successful registration, users receive QR-coded tickets for event check-in.
Admins monitor event registrations, view analytics, generate reports, and communicate with attendees via email templates.
At event time, QR code scanning enables quick and secure attendee check-in.
Admin users can manage usage metrics, subscriptions, and tenant-specific data securely.
System manages multi-tenant data isolation ensuring each tenantâ€™s data security and privacy.
validation_criteria: All static pages and admin interfaces load without critical UI errors.
Event creation workflows allow full configuration and save correctly.
User registration and social login flows authenticate and create user profiles successfully.
Stripe payment processing completes transactions and updates registration status.
QR codes are generated post-registration and scannable at check-in points.
Admin dashboards update event analytics real-time with accurate data.
Search and filtering functions return relevant event and registrant results quick and accurate.
Email notifications send reliably according to triggered event conditions.
Media uploads succeed and media is properly linked to events.
Multi-tenant data separation is enforced and verified with no data leakage.
